name: Agency reports, required information
text:
§90-5  Agency reports, required information.  A state agency as part of its annual report to the governor, the legislature, or the chief justice shall include estimates of:
     (1)  The total number of volunteers and the total number of hours of service broken down into categories of regular-service volunteers, occasional volunteers, stipended volunteers, and material donors.
     (2)  A list of volunteer job titles used by the agency. [L 1978, c 10, pt of §2; am L 1998, c 295, §3]
